attributes.action: To ban any music or artists from performing in the UK whose lyrics promote homophobia and transphobia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many artists from certain music genres seem to promote a hatred of homosexual and transsexuals in their lyrics. I want the government to ban the sale of such material, and also ban the said artists from performing here in the UK. The music is poisoning youth attitudes to LGBT people, BAN IT NOW!
